title: How to describe the world to a blind child - Quora

response.answer_text: I think if you were to try, you would only confuse and hurt yourself. On top of that, can a blind child describe their world to you? The world that a blind person sees, and your world while the same are perceived differently. many look at blind people and they’re automatically sorry for the blind person. Frankly, this attitude is one which I have ran into one too many times. It does absolutely nothing but annoy the blind person. For me, I find that as a blind person it gives me the opportunity to share my faith.
You let them experience it. They can learn, through touch and hearing, more than you might anticipate. You explain, allowing them to ask questions and to try new things.
By touch and feel and then let them decided how they want it to be.
